seller_description: The Portable LCD Electronic Balance Digital Scale is compact, lightweight, and easy to carry, making it ideal for on-the-go use, whether in your pocket or tackle box. With a capacity of 110lb/50kg and an accuracy of 5g or 10g, its LCD screen displays weight in multiple units (g/kg/lb/oz) for versatility. It features a convenient weighing unit switch, data lock function, overload indication, and automatic power-off after 120 seconds of inactivity, ensuring efficiency and ease of use. The blue LCD backlight provides clear readability day or night, enhancing user convenience.
review: After using product 4-5 days, product is working good and easily readable. Design is also good, best part of the product is you can weight the product in 3 different units.
conclusion: The Portable LCD Electronic Balance Digital Scale aligns well with the seller's description and the buyer's review. The seller emphasizes its compactness, multiple weight units (g/kg/lb/oz), and features like data lock and automatic power-off for convenience. The buyer's review corroborates these claims, particularly highlighting the ease of readability and the ability to measure weight in three different units. The product's design, as mentioned in the review, meets the expectations set by the seller. There are no discrepancies between the seller's description and the buyer's experience, and the buyer appears satisfied with the product's performance. Hence, there is no fault attributable to the seller, as the product meets the advertised standards and functionalities.
